tgt_original: vajreṇādīptavapuṣā sphālayāmi trikāyajān ||161 ||  laṃghayedyadi kaścinme viśīryetātra nānyathā |
om gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ hū hū hū vajra kīla[ya] vajradhara ājñāpayati kāyavākcittavajra kīlaya hū phaṭ |
sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |
dadyātsarvakṛtājaptaṃ śiṣyebhyo yati rādarāt ||199 ||  dvādaśāṅgulapuṣpāgramakīṭāpāṭitāvraṇam |  āśvatthodumbarāvakraṃ pradadyāddantadhāvanam ||200 ||
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||  ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca |
tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
pure śiṣyapraveśārthaṃ tattvaṃ satyaṃ ca śrāvayet ||281 ||
tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
vajraṃ satpratyavekṣātmādhipaḥ kṛtyakaro'rthadaḥ ||311 ||  jñānaṃ vidyātra vajraṃ syāddhāturgotraṃ vaśīhya(kṛ)taḥ |
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryā bodhiragrā jinairmatā |
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryaṃ vajrapāṇi dṛḍhavratam ||313 ||
om sarvatathāgatasiddhivajrasamaye tiṣṭha eṣa tvāṃ dhārayāmi hīḥ hi hi hi hi hū |  sarvānvajravrataṃ dattvā vajraṃ tattvena grāhayet |
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |  yasyotpādanamātreṇa buddha eva na saṃśayaḥ ||385 ||
saddharmo na pratikṣepyo na ca tyājyaḥ kadācana |
ajñānādvātha mohādvā na vai vivṛṇuyāt sa tu ||386 ||
vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca na vai tyājyā kadācana |
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena vajrācāryaṃ mahāgurum |  pracchannavarakalyāṇaṃ nāvamanyet kadācana ||391 ||
anurūpaṃ ca te deyaṃ gurubhaktaṃ sadakṣiṇam |
tato jvarādayastāpā na bhūyaḥ prabhavanti hi ||392 ||
nityaṃ ca gurave deyaṃ sarvabuddhasamo hyasau ||393 ||
tad dānāt puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ sambhārādbodhiruttamā |  datte'smai sarvabuddhebhyo dattaṃ bhavati śāśvatam ||394 ||
adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yadasmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ |
ayaṃ vaḥ satataṃ rakṣaḥ(kṣyaḥ)  siddhaḥ samayasaṃvaraḥ |
adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram |
